title: Halloween Special: Campfire Tales
itunes:title: Halloween Special: Campfire Tales
itunes:subtitle: Jo and Faye tell two personal ghost stories but you can also find them exploring haunted and abandoned buildings on youtube in The Ghost Trail series.Find the Ghost Trail Series here:https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCyswG_oLkVQV9vQNnpJj1_ADave Kee...
description:
Jo and Faye tell two personal ghost stories but you can also find them exploring haunted and abandoned buildings on youtube in The Ghost Trail series.

Find the Ghost Trail Series here:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCyswG_oLkVQV9vQNnpJj1_A


Dave Keen tells The Grey Man. You can find Dave keen on patreon, co-hosting 50p Movie Club with Dan. You can also find him on instagram @exskeenyboy

Find 50p Movie Club on our $2 tier on Patreon:

https://www.patreon.com/reallifeghoststories


Sinead tells the story of The Lottery by Shirley Jackson and can be found hosting The Poisoners’ Cabinet Podcast and fronting the folk horror band The Demon Gin.

Find The Poisoners’ Cabinet Here:

https://www.buzzsprout.com/884599


Emma tells the story of The Red Room by H.G Wells and you can find a copy of that here:

https://www.gutenberg.org/files/23218/23218-h/23218-h.htm


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
